channel.title: Parameter time type
channel.description: Hello, I tried to find a solution to use only Time type like '08:05:00' in the parameters, but I found only Date or Date and Time. Is it possible to include this feature to next version? If anybody knows work way to use it, describe please.

item.title: Parameter time type
item.dc:creator: Funny92
item.description:
Hello, I tried to find a solution to use only Time type like ‘08:05:00’ in the parameters, but I found only Date or Date and Time. Is it possible to include this feature to next version? If anybody knows work way to use it, describe please.

Read full topic
